Class JwtAccessDeniedHandler

java.lang.Object
autoberlo.autoberlo.auth.JwtAccessDeniedHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.security.web.access.AccessDeniedHandler
@Component public class JwtAccessDeniedHandler extends Object implements org.springframework.security.web.access.AccessDeniedHandler
Custom implementation of AccessDeniedHandler that is triggered when a user tries to access a resource without the required permissions.

This handler returns a structured JSON error object including the HTTP status code, status type, and a human-readable error message.

Example of the returned JSON: 
 {
   "statusCode": 401,
   "httpStatus": "UNAUTHORIZED",
   "reason": "UNAUTHORIZED",
   "message": "You do not have permission to access this page"
 }
Author:
Mandrusz Zsolt, Németh Marcell, Szász Kristóf
